change.item: Added 1875-1880 item to container list, and made adjustments to date ranges.

titlepage.publisher:
Special Collections & Archives
Wesleyan University
Middletown, CT, USA

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult Special Collections & Archives staff.
did.abstract: Wesleyan University viewbooks are brochures or booklets featuring photographs and information about the university. They are most often intended for prospective students, but may also be designed to attract donors.
The Viewbooks Collection contains items related to Wesleyan University from 1875 through 2006. They frequently include photographs and statistics from the time period.

userestrict.head: Copyright Notice
userestrict.p: Copyright for Official University records is held by Wesleyan University; all other copyright is retained by the authors of items in these papers, or their descendants, as stipulated by United States copyright law.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Viewbooks Collection, Collection #1000-116, Special Collections & Archives, Wesleyan University, Middletown, CT, USA.

acqinfo.head: Acquisitions Information
acqinfo.p: Gathered by staff of University Archives.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Wesleyan University viewbooks are brochures or booklets featuring photographs and information about the university. They are most often intended for prospective students, but may also be designed to attract donors.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: The Viewbooks Collection contains items related to Wesleyan University from 1893 through 2006. They frequently include photographs and statistics from the time period.

controlaccess.head: Online Catalog Headings
controlaccess.p: These and related materials may be found under the following headings in online catalogs.
controlaccess.subject: Advertising--Universities and colleges.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Vertical Files on Admissions and the Admissions Department available in Special Collections & Archives, Wesleyan University.

scopecontent.p: 2 page description of Wesleyan's curriculum, campus, Middletown, and expenses. For further information or for catalogues, apply to the President, Rev. Cyrus D. Foss, D.D., Middletown, Conn.
Includes photos with captions, but no other text. 2 copies.

did.unittitle: Souvenir of Wesleyan University, published in the interests of the Athletic Associations of the College by the Wesleyan Argus, 1896

scopecontent.p: Includes photos with captions, but no other text. 3 copies, two with a brown cover, one with a red cover.

did.unittitle: A Circular of Information Concerning Wesleyan University, Middletown, Conn., 1899

scopecontent.p: Issued by the faculty for the benefit of prospective students.

did.unittitle: Wesleyan University: Her History and Her Needs, 1900

scopecontent.p: By Arthur Goodrich, managing editor of The World's Work.
By Arthur Goodrich.

did.unittitle: Views of Wesleyan at Middletown, Conn., circa 1906-1907

scopecontent.p: Cover title: Glimpses of Wesleyan.

p.emph: A booklet published for the purpose of presenting to friends of Wesleyan University a few glimpses of her campus and its beautiful surroundings. Published by Robert W. Rice [class of 1908] and John J. Norton [class of 1910]. Delta Kappa Epsilon House, Middletown, Conn.

did.unittitle: A Talk with a Sub-Freshman by an Undergraduate of Wesleyan University, circa 1910

scopecontent.p: 2 copies, slightly different layout and cover on each.
Arranged for the Wesleyan Alumni Council, by K. M. Goode, [class of] 1904. 2 copies.
Written by Henry Merritt Wriston as part of the campaign to raise $3,000,000 for the university's endowment. 2 copies.
3 copies.
2 copies.
Edited by the Wesleyan University Alumni Council.
Edited by the Wesleyan University Alumni Council.
Edited by the Wesleyan University Alumni Council.
Text with prints by Louis Orr.
2 copies.

did.unittitle: A Student Description of College Life at Wesleyan, Written and Edited by Undergraduates, circa 1931-1932

scopecontent.p: Text only.
2 copies.

did.unittitle: Wesleyan University: A Student Looks at Wesleyan, circa 1935

scopecontent.p: Written and Edited by Undergraduates (Professor Snow's Course in Advanced Composition)
Includes photographs, no text. 3 copies.

did.unittitle: An Illustrated Description of Wesleyan University, Middletown, Connecticut, in Words and Pictures, 1936-1937

scopecontent.p: Published by the University.
A supplement to the Wesleyan University Alumnus, January 1937. 2 copies.

did.unittitle: Wesleyan University, Middletown, Connecticut, in Words and Pictures, 1938-1939

scopecontent.p: Also includes An Illustrated Description of Wesleyan University,

did.unittitle: An Illustrated Description of Wesleyan University, January 1941

scopecontent.p: Supplement to the Wesleyan University Alumnus, Volume XXV, Number 3. 2 copies, one of which has no printing on cover.
Published by the College Store, Wesleyan University.

did.unittitle: Wesleyan University: A College of Liberal Arts, 1946

scopecontent.p: 2 copies.
Includes note stating that Wesleyan was only able to admit one-fifth of applicants in 1946, and that circumstances have forced the school to turn away strong applicants.

did.unittitle: Wesleyan University: A College of Liberal Arts and Sciences, Middletown, Connecticut, 1953

scopecontent.p: 2 copies.
Published by the Development Program, Wesleyan University. 2 copies. One copy includes letter from John E. Kaltenbach, Executive Director of University Development.

did.unittitle: Wesleyan University: A College of Liberal Arts and Sciences, circa 1956

scopecontent.p: 2 copies.
